name: Backyard Wrestling: Don't Try This at Home
name_original: Backyard Wrestling: Don't Try This at Home
description:
Backyard Wrestling: Don't Try This at Home is an arcade-fighting game developed by Paradox Development Studio. It came out on 07-10-2003. It was published by Eidos Interactive.
Backyard Wrestling: Don't Try This at Home is available on PlayStation 2 and Xbox.
